trans-unit.source: Provides a file system implementation of the <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma implementação de sistema de ficheiros da <xref:System.Net.WebResponse>classe.</xref:System.Net.WebResponse>

trans-unit.source: The FileWebResponse class implements the <xref:System.Net.WebResponse>`abstract` base class to return file system resources for the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: A classe de FileWebResponse implementa o <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> `abstract` classe para devolver os recursos do sistema de ficheiros para a <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>classe</xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> base</xref:System.Net.WebResponse>

trans-unit.source: Client applications do not create FileWebResponse instances directly; instead, they are created by calling the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.GetResponse%2A> method on a <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> instance.
trans-unit.target: Aplicações de cliente não criar instâncias de FileWebResponse diretamente; em vez disso, são criados ao chamar o <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>método num <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>instância.</xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> </xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A> method returns a <xref:System.IO.Stream> instance that provides read-only access to a file system resource.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A>método devolve um <xref:System.IO.Stream>instância que fornece acesso só de leitura a um recurso de sistema de ficheiros.</xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The FileWebResponse class relies on the <xref:System.IO.File> class for error handling and code access security.
trans-unit.target: A classe de FileWebResponse depende o <xref:System.IO.File>classe para o processamento de erros e de segurança de acesso de código.</xref:System.IO.File>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"></xref> class from the specified instances of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> classes.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"> </xref> classe a partir de instâncias especificadas do <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> e <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>classes.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: This constructor implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface for the <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse> class.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor implementa a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>interface para a <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse>classe.</xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance that contains the information required to serialize the new <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> instância que contém as informações necessárias para serializar o novo <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> class that contains the source of the serialized stream associated with the new <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>classe que contém a origem da sequência serializada associada com o novo <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"> </xref> instância.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Closes the response stream.
trans-unit.target: Fecha o fluxo de respostas.

trans-unit.source: The Close method cleans up the resources used by a <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse> and closes the response stream by calling the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: O método Fechar limpa os recursos utilizados por um <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse>e fecha o fluxo de respostas ao chamar o <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The response stream must be closed to avoid running out of system resources.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Tem de fechar o fluxo de respostas para evitar a execução fora de recursos do sistema.

trans-unit.source: You can closes the response stream by calling either <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or Close
trans-unit.target: Pode fechar a sequência de resposta ao chamar um <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ou fechar</xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the content in the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o comprimento do conteúdo no recurso de sistema de ficheiros.

trans-unit.source: The ContentLength property contains the length, in bytes, of the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ContentLength contém o comprimento, em bytes, do recurso de sistema de ficheiros.

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes returned from the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: O número de bytes devolvido pelo recurso de sistema de ficheiros.

trans-unit.source: Gets the content type of the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de conteúdo do recurso de sistema de ficheiros.

trans-unit.source: The ContentType property contains the content type of the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ContentType contém o tipo de conteúdo do recurso de sistema de ficheiros.

trans-unit.source: The value of ContentType is always "binary/octet-stream".
trans-unit.target: O valor de ContentType é sempre "binary/octet-stream".

trans-unit.source: The value "binary/octet-stream".
trans-unit.target: O valor "binary/octet-stream".

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the data needed to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: Preenche um <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> com os dados necessários para serializar o objeto de destino.

trans-unit.source: Any objects included in the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> are automatically tracked and serialized by the formatter.
trans-unit.target: Quaisquer objetos incluídos a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>automaticamente registadas e serializado pelo formatador.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> para preencher com dados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that specifies the destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que especifica o destino para esta serialização.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Returns the data stream from the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o fluxo de dados do recurso de sistema de ficheiros.

trans-unit.source: The GetResponseStream method returns the data stream from the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: O método GetResponseStream devolve o fluxo de dados do recurso de sistema de ficheiros.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The response stream must be closed to avoid running out of system resources.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Tem de fechar o fluxo de respostas para evitar a execução fora de recursos do sistema.

trans-unit.source: The response stream can be closed by calling <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Close%2A>
trans-unit.target: A sequência de resposta pode ser fechada chamando <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ou <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Close%2A></xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Close%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> for reading data from the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.IO.Stream>para ler dados a partir do recurso de sistema de ficheiros.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of header name/value pairs associated with the response.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de pares nome/valor de cabeçalho associado a resposta.

trans-unit.source: The Headers property contains two name/value pairs, one for content length and one for content type, both of which are also exposed as properties, <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentLength%2A> and <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de cabeçalhos contém dois pares de nome/valor, um para o comprimento do conteúdo e outra para o tipo de conteúdo, que também são expostos como propriedades <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentLength%2A>e <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentType%2A>.</xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentType%2A> </xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection> that contains the header name/value pairs associated with the response.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection>que contém os pares nome/valor de cabeçalho associados a resposta.</xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets the URI of the file system resource that provided the response.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o URI do recurso de sistema de ficheiro fornecido a resposta.

trans-unit.source: The ResponseUri property contains the URI of the file system resource that provided the response.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ResponseUri contém o URI do recurso de sistema de ficheiro fornecido a resposta.

trans-unit.source: This is always the file system resource that was requested.
trans-unit.target: Este é sempre o recurso de sistema de ficheiros pedida.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> that contains the URI of the file system resource that provided the response.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Uri>que contém o URI do recurso de sistema de ficheiro fornecido a resposta.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers*> property is supported by the <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers*>propriedade é suportada pelo <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"> </xref> instância.</xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers*>

trans-unit.source: This property is always true for [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é sempre verdadeira na [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref:System.Boolean>.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: true if the <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers*> property is supported by the <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"></xref> instance; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: VERDADEIRO se o <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers*>propriedade é suportada pelo <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"> </xref> instância; caso contrário, FALSO.</xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers*>

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance with the data needed to serialize the <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Preenche um <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> instância com os dados necessários para serializar o <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> , which will hold the serialized data for the <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> , que armazena os dados serializados para o <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> containing the destination of the serialized stream associated with the new <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que contém o destino de fluxo serializado associado com o novo <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"> </xref>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>
